channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: God's Last Message to the World
channel.desc: Dr. Allan Lindsay examines the prophecies in the Book of Revelation of the prophet Daniel to reveal God's final message to His creation.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Spotless
channel.desc: In London, the life of Jean, a troubled crime scene cleaner, is turned upside down when his outlaw brother Martin crash lands into his world, entangling them in the deadly dynamics of organized crime.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Adventist World Aviation
channel.desc: This is an inspiring series that follows the missionaries of Adventist World Aviation in their journey of faith and service in the Philippines. Through heartfelt interviews, discover how these pilots dedicate their lives to delivering humanitarian aid, medical support, and a message of hope to remote communities. With courage and determination, they soar through the skies and overcome challenges to fulfill their mission. Get ready for powerful stories of love, sacrifice, and miracles.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Amazing Facts With Doug Batchelor
channel.desc: Born to wealthy parents, Doug grew up mostly as a non-churched person; after an early life of crime, drugs and wild living, Doug sought to find meaning in life by living in a cave in California; during this time alone he discovered God.

channel.title: Digging Deeper

They delve into the foundational truths of Christianity, discussing the sacrificial love of Jesus, His victory over sin and death, and the hope of eternal life for believers.
